mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_good (name, price, stock, introduce, img, category_id, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{introduce}, #{img}, #{category.id}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT *, t1.id AS 'good_id', t1.name AS 'good_name', t2.id AS 'category_id', t2.name AS 'category_name' FROM t_good t1 LEFT JOIN t_category t2 ON (t1.category_id = t2.id) WHERE t1.id = #{id}
